name: Timberman
description: Become a Timberman, chop wood and avoid the branches. Almost 30 million players could not be wrong - featured as one of the best casual games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics

reviews.review_text: This is nice. A game about rapidly pressing two buttons. All about skill, no distractions. Has some challenges, giving you characters for bragging rights in multiplayer.  Multiplayer adds a surprising amount of depth, although really it's just multiple people independently doing their thing. Mind games are a thing, even. Matchmaking is kinda busted. Even though there is ranking, you just get random people. But that's fun in its own way (unless you're just bad without any chance of improvement), because everyone can mess up.  ★★★★★★★☆☆☆

Timberman is AWESOM !!!!! Super Basic... Super addicting !!!!  Oldschool pixel art !!! You only use 2 buttons. (left and right). You chop yor way though 1 big tree. Try to beat you own score... multiplayer online and offline splitscreen.  It's a super fun game !!! Only fo 1 dollar / euro. And when in sale it's allmost for free.  I give this a 10/10 score.

Annoyingly addicting, simple yet challenging, cheap but fun.  Multiplayer is also pretty good, although it just matches you with random people instead of players from your skill level. It's definitely worth buying because it is really easy and fun to play, while also a bit competitive and challenging at the same time.

Being fast, and faster or even fastest to destroy your keyboard (I mean chopping trees).  Timberman is a very fun game that you can enjoy with some friends, or even a friend, or alone. There's no end for tree, it's just end of the timberman if he got pwnd by the tree. Multiplayer? Yes it has multiplayer, the goal is simple, you need to wait for someone getting pwnd by his/her own tree.  Don't give this game to kids.  8/10 Tree is destroying my A|D.

Become a Timberman, chop wood and avoid the branches. Almost 30 million players could not be wrong - featured as one of the best casual games.  - The Game was fun - Multi-player <3 - NOT BORING - 11/10
A very fun game for when you are bored and the devs are always updating the game with new features The devs are awesome and the game is only $1! Get it now; you have no reason not to.
Canadian Lumberjack Simulator. That statement alone speaks for itself. Buy it.

Really fun and addictive game, my keys nearly broke as I spammed the keys relentlessly trying to keep up with the energy bar, but yeah overall really good game has a lot of really good new features they added in to the steam version and 5 new exclusive characters. 30 something hours and I still can't get that darn Gaben character.   8.5/10
Timberman is the game that train our body connection between eyes, brain, and hands.

Ever wanted to beat your wood, but you want a little bit of challenge? Ever wanted to challenge 3 other people and see who can beat their wood the best? This is the game for you!  10/10 would beat wood with strangers again.

This game is totally fun and really cheap. You can play with your friends or people you don't know in multiplayer matches, so it's not just a single player game. You can unlock achievements (some of them seems impossible) and crew members with playing and getting more chops or higher scores. If you wanna have some fun I can recommend it even on full price. :) Oh and it has leaderboards which makes it more interesting.

Often times engaging game, with it's main aspect of having that 'reflex consistency check' with a ranking/skillcap rating feature as well on the leaderboards.  Instant gratification comes from once you start getting your rhythm going; it doesn't last though and you may put the game down for awhile to come back at a later date. Good multiplayer, playerbase can be quite scarce though. Feature to invite Steam friends over for a match. Local Co-op support.  Summary: If you like some of the aspects that games like One Finger Death Punch has and the frustration factor of Flappy Bird, then you'll like this game.
Like Flappy Bird but with trees.

Oh, I'm a lumberjack, and I'm okay, I sleep all night and I work all day.  I cut down trees, I eat my lunch, I go to the lava-try. On Wednesdays I go shoppin' And have buttered scones for tea.  I cut down trees, I skip and jump, I like to press wild flowers. I put on women's clothing, And hang around in bars.  I chop down trees, I wear high heels, Suspenders and a bra. I wish I'd been a girlie Just like my dear mama.  And it also has many lumberjack costumes, and easily accessible online versus multiplayer! And in game leaderboards!  Monty Python made this song!

All of that for one dollar? what the heck are you waiting for to buy it? Seriously, just a warning though, you might need to assist anger management after playing long enough, lol.

So I've had this sitting in my library for a few months now, It's a cheap game and I'm a bit of a magpie for bright colours. Yesterday, in a space of absolute boredom I decided to boot it up. Twenty minutes later I was hooked. This game is great. It's simple, so absolutely anyone can play it, and it's surprisingly fun.  It's got the same level of frustration/simplicity you find with games like Flappy Bird, so keep that in mind. You can also unlock new costumes/characters the more you manage to chop, so there is at least a few things you can work towards in single-player. Highly recommended.
Fun to play with friends, or waste some time playing.  Can get very addicting trying to beat your own highscore.

Gameplay is pretty simple: press two keys for chopping part of a tree from left or right, avoid branches when the rest of the tree falls or you will die. Play with up to three more people on the net or two on the same computer.  Tree generation seems random, it could have had different difficulty trees. There is tons of characters which only differ on graphics.  It depends on how much you like this kind of simple casual games. For me, it wore off pretty quickly.

This game is nothing special, as far as I can tell NONE of the other skins aka characters you can unlock offer you any advantage over any other character what so ever! This is a so-so game for an I pad, or a tablet, maybe even a phone. But over all this game is horrible & all it offers is making you become faster at reaction times or learning how to cheat. It has two simple control directions left & right, that is all you have as controls for this game.

It's just... Boring... I've only played a couple minutes and i got bored already. It's just like a mobile game on a pc. Why would you want to play a mobile game on pc? I don't know, but whatever. Some people might, but i don't, and I can't recommend this game, unfortunately. Sorry devs.

kept it for the trading cards and to avoid the hassle of refund, i personally could not get past the menu screen but a couple of times after numerous tries, and even then the game is so glitched it 'plays itself' in the sense that it seems to randomly click everywhere like a coke fiend having an epilepsy attack, these few moments i made it into singleplayer i was spammed with 'wanting to join a multiplayer match' even though i disabled this feature in the options with the same difficulty as getting to click on the single player icon in the same menu. i had all controllers disconnected apart mouse and keyboard, tried numerous restarts, searched with enough effort that i deemed for a 1euro mobile game for a fix and i could not find it. badly ported mobile app for me.

[ENG] SERIOUSLY, What the f*ck is wrong with the reviews. Once again this explains to NOT trust steam reviews, you always have to try by yourself a game. This is a very stupid game without a sense, it could be on any flash games website, for free. Why? Because you just have to press A/D or Left/Right arrow key or Left/Right mouse button for chopping. That's ALL.  What you say? There's multiplayer? WOOOOOOW, NOW THIS MAKES THIS GAME VERY FUNNY XDddddddd!11!!11!1 Very funny to see other players doing the same stupid thing. 'BUT THERE ARE ALSO SKINS!!1!!11!'  I got this abortion by a giveaway, now i'll just take free collecting cards.  [ITA] Ma seriamente? Cosa sono tutte queste recensioni positive su steam? Io non vi capisco. Ancora una volta questo dimostra che NON bisogna credere nelle recensioni di steam, bisogna sempre provarli in prima persona i giochi. Questo è un gioco veramente stupido e senza senso, potrebbe benissimo essere gratuito su uno dei tanti siti con giochi flash. Perchè? Perchè si deve solamente premere A/D o le frecce direzionali o il tasto destro/sinistro del mouse per tagliare la legna. Questo è TUTTO. Cosa dici? C'è il multiplayer? WOOOOOW, QUESTO ADESSO SICURAMENTE RENDERA' IL GIOCO DIVERTENTE! XdDdd!1!! Già, molto divertente vedere altri falliti fare la stessa stupida azione di continuo. 'EH MA CI SONO PURE LE SKIN1!1!!!'  Ho avuto questo aborto con un giveaway, ora lo lascerò in background per prendere le carte collezionabili.
I just wanted to be that one guy who 'dislikes' the game for reviews. I might actually rlly like this deinitely! Maybe.
Boring, annoying and stupid game. Only what you need to do is  Click Click Click.....

The game is polished and performs well, but unfortunately it lacks depth.  The premise is simple: chop down a tree a quickly as you can without being hit by the tree's branches. You can command your character to chop the tree from either the left or the right side, but if you chop too slowly or hit a tree branch it's game over.  The multiplayer option is nice if you have someone to play with as it can add longevity to the game, but if I'm being honest here you've more or less experieced everything the game has to offer after just a few minutes of playing. It's for this reason that I can't really bring myself to recommend the game, although it is cheap if you do feel like giving it a try. Perhaps wait for a sale, though.
